name: SJ Cares Discount
description: 10% discount on SJCE electricity charges; automatic enrollment for CARE or FERA customers
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy provides an additional 10% discount on electricity charges for income-qualified customers already enrolled in PG&E's CARE or FERA programs, helping reduce energy costs.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% discount on SJCE electricity charges
- Automatic enrollment for CARE/FERA customers
- Stacks with existing PG&E discounts
- No separate application needed
- Applies to monthly electricity bill
- Ongoing savings while enrolled
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Enroll in CARE or FERA through PG&E
3. Once enrolled, SJ Cares discount is automatic
4. No additional application required
5. Discount appears on monthly bill
6. Maintain CARE/FERA eligibility to keep discount
